course.subject: CORE
course.name: Introduction to Moral Philosophy
course.description: This introductory course examines various beliefs and questions underlying our moral lives. These include the relation between morality and religion, subjectivism, relativism, self-interest, the rights and wrongs of euthanasia, etc. Also, certain ethical theories claim to help us make the right moral decisions, e.g. utilitarianism. This course is a systematic exploration of such beliefs and theories, emphasizing critical thinking and reasonable justification.
course.prerequisites: a passing letter grade in CORE 1401 OR CORE 1402 OR CORE 1403 OR CORE 1404 OR LANG 1002 (prior to 2022-23)

reviews.author: 準雷
reviews.title: 幾有趣而且workload唔大嘅哲學入門course
reviews.comment_content:
道德哲學入門
由最古代講到現代

Introduction:
1. An overview of moral theories
2. Philosophical reasoning

Part One: Ethical Theories of the Ancient World
1. Relativism
----------Midterm Exam start from here----------
2. Virtue ethics
3. Confucian ethics
4. Buddhist ethics
5. Daoist ethics

Part Two: Modern Moral Theories
1. Sentimentalism and the is-ought fallacy
2. Act utilitarianism
3. Rule utilitarianism
4. Deontology
5. Egoism
6. Capabilities approach
----------- Midterm Exam up to here-----------

Part Three: Applied Ethics
1. Animals
2. Nudging
3. Euthanasia
4. Abortion
reviews.comment_teaching:
Dennis教得唔錯
上堂教書唔會趕進度
而且英文講得好好
Lecture powerpoint基本上有齊哂啲內容
入面有例子解釋唔同嘅哲學概念
算係哲學既入門
堂上佢都會再解釋返
但自己睇powerpoint理解都可以
佢唔會主動問問題
反而有好多同學問佢問題
reviews.comment_grading:
Participation 20%
最少做8次200字左右嘅moral dilemma discussion
每個2.5分 做多過8次就計最高分嘅8次
My Score: 19.5/20

Midterm Exam (Closed book, 80 mins) 30%
Short questions 5選4作答
Mean: 22.23  (LQ: 19.5, Median: 23.25, UQ: 26.5)
My Score: 22/30

Final Essay 50%
800-1200字, sem尾交, 題目自己定
要用一個part 1/2 moral theory
對應返一個part 3嘅applied ethics
Mean: 42.4/50  (LQ: 40, Median: 46, UQ: 48)
My Score: 31/50

Overall: 72.5%
Grade: C+
炒咗essay, 算係咁

Tentative Scheme for conversion of total % to letter grade:

97% or above = A+
93%~ = A
90%~ = A-
85%~ = B+
80%~ = B
75%~ = B-
70%~ = C+
65%~ = C
60%~ = C-
40%~ = D
Lower than 40% = F
reviews.comment_workload:
一般偏低啦
TA有比discussion滿分sample
照住個套路寫就得
寫完自己嘅意見之後可以唔回應人
考試方面題目都好直接
所以唔洗睇哂reading
focus係reading questions就基本上都識答大部分嘅題目
Essay方面比較特別
只係要寫一個argument+counterargument
而且唔可以有logic fallacy
唔好用AI寫文+check grammar
Dennis只係care concept
所以1-2日時間應該都完成到
